about_the_game:
=== Story Introduction ===




In the year 20XX, on a certain day in Japan, over 500 people were transported to another world by the same truck, simply because someone had discovered a
method to summon heroes en masse.

You, Akane Tanino, a big-breasted redhead and the eldest daughter of a farming family, are one of the victims who found themselves in this unfamiliar world.

Upon arrival, you fell into the Demon King's trap and nearly lost your life.

A messenger of the goddess saved you, but not because you are a hero. Like the others, you are merely an innocent bystander.

With so many people already transported, the goddess simply wishes for you to return home safely and live the relatively happy life you once had.

But... who can resist the allure of a different world? As you collect the four great artifacts and approach the moment of sending yourself back home, what
mischievous thoughts will you entertain?

“Although you are not a hero, I hope you will have a short and interesting journey.”

=== Character Introduction ===




Akane Tanino, 21 years old, part-time bunny girl, encountered a traffic accident while on her way to buy a birthday gift for her family and was unfortunately
sent to another world.

“I’m fighting... goblins, seriously?”

— Well, aside from her large chest, there’s not much else to mention about her character.

=== Gameplay Introduction ===




Rich Physics System: If a falling rock can crush you, it should also be able to flatten your enemies. Use the environment creatively to kill enemies in various
ways!

High Degree of Freedom: A unique skill tree incorporating roguelike design principles. To grow, you must bear the corresponding pain.

Clones: They can take damage for you, but if used too often, you’ll become the scapegoat.

Destroy All Obstacles: You can obliterate all obstacles in one hit, but the recoil will also damage your armor and clothes.

Lure Enemies by Reducing Clothing: You can lure enemies by removing clothing, then kick them in the nuts or off a cliff for an instant kill, but if you mess up,
the consequences are dire.

Lockpicking: There are at least four different methods to pick a lock.

And many more...

No Game Over for Combat Failure: Instead, you can unlock a new mini-game and revive in full health.



The game supports keyboard and mouse operations.

content_descriptors.notes: This is a game where clothing gets damaged when taking hits, and upon defeat, the character may be kidnapped and subjected to rape, including missionary rape and rear-entry rape.

name: Devil Batch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 / AMD Radeon HD 6870 DirectX 版本: 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10/11
  • Processor: Intel i5 12400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon HD 6870 DirectX 版本: 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound

steam_germany.descriptors:
Sexualisierte Gewalt / Sexual violence
Drastische Gewalt

short_description: Specifically designed for one-handed operation, this high-freedom, erotic action RPG (ARPG) features level-based challenges. The concept originated from the author's hospital stay, during which their left hand was impaired.
